text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Haahahahaha! I've been waiting for you, trainer <username>!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The look on her face as she takes on the final… Mmm! She's practically glowing with motivation.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Excellent! Then I have but one thing to say.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Believe in the strength of your horse girl, and grasp victory together!
The gate to the finals of the URA Finals is finally open!
